Table 14.  Number of sentenced  American Indian prisoners
under State or Federal jurisdiction, by gender, 1990, 1995 -97
Note: The number of American Indian inmates was based on reports in NPS, which
exclude those held in detention facilities in Indian country.  The number with sentences
sentences of more than 1 year have been estimated and rounded to the nearest 100.
